ygData.subject: RE: Level times
ygData.msgSnippet: I used to play meridian 59. I loved this game but people got burned out on it becuase you could build too fast and then got bored. Then people went around and
ygData.messageBody:
I used to play meridian 59. I loved this game but people got burned out on
it becuase you could build too fast and then got bored. Then people went
around and PKed each other. It turned a wonderful online community into a
garbage dump. What is your great hurry? You planning on leaving soon? As
long as you are having fun and meeting new people and playing a game you
like what difference does it make what level you are or how fast you get
there. These games are ment to be played for years not weeks. I am
surprised that people have already been able to max out. Now what do they
have to do? Ok they can go anywhere and kill almost anything but how long
before they get bored and move on? The game has only been out a few months.

Just my 2 cents

Feather Dreamwalker of Rathe
>
>I agree that level gaining is quite slow. 8-10 hours
>for a level is a bit much. I can't imagine the high
>30s and above.
>
>Belgarth
>
